headline: Exelon (EXC): ComEd Announces Start of V2G Charging Pilot’s Testing Phase
summary: Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC) is one of the Best Electric Utility Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 10, ComEd, which is a unit of Exelon Corporation (NASDAQ:EXC), announced the start of its vehicle-to-grid (V2G) charging pilot’s testing phase with 3 Illinois school districts. The V2G charging pilot will evaluate the technology, which can allow bidirectional charging with electric school […]
